item.title: Pot hole is back, 31st January
item.description:
You can see this has been “fixed” previously at least a couple times. But obviously the poor workmanship has failed and the hole is back. As the road has been narrowed so much to accommodate the cycle path, the hole is unavoidable. Maybe chelt council could retarmac their half of the road to match the rest of it that falls under tewks council.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole damaging cars on marsland road just before winterbotham road, 31st January
item.description:
It is on Marsland Road if you were to drive towards Coronation Square on the right side of the road on the traffic calming hump. Is causing damage to cars and needs filling straight away. 1 Wilson court is where the pothole is on the road on the hump.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Marsland Road, Fiddler's Green, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Continual flooding for weeks at ///leaps.draw.curry, 31st January
item.description:
Either a water main is leaking as seems to be evidenced by upwelling of water in centre of flooded area, or Hatherley Brook is blocked, causing overflowing ditches all the way back to Hayden village.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
